item.title: NextJS - TailwindCSS - Supabase - Prisma
item.description: A NextJS Site with a SQL Backend It’s raining JavaScript frameworks! There are as many frameworks as there are free places to host your Javascript Framework based site. That only works for PHP if you’re willing to build a wordpress site. So before the rest of the free world decides to charge for their products like Heroku. I’m jumping on the bandwagon. I like NextJS. I’m going to run with that and hook it up to a SQL backend.
